document.full_text: after listening to a secret tape recording of a new york city police officer saying he used a condom, an alleged rape victim told the jury hearing her case on thursday, "i knew what he had done."
document.title: tape of police, alleged victim played in nypd rape case
lines_and_colors: after listening to a secret tape recording of a new york city police officer saying he used a condom, an alleged rape victim told the jury hearing her case on thursday, "i knew what he had done."
